headline.main: Bullitt Asks War Now, Tells Republicans At Philadelphia Roosevelt Is Lagging

lead_paragraph: PHILADELPHIA, Oct. 23 -- William C. Bullitt, former Ambassador to France, said today that the United States should declare war upon Germany at once, that war is inevitable.
snippet: PHILADELPHIA, Oct. 23 -- William C. Bullitt, former Ambassador to France, said today that the United States should declare war upon Germany at once, that war is inevitable....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
